scripts.build: rm -rf publish && mkdir -p publish/hm-walls/dist publish/hm-walls-api/dist publish/material-test publish/mynsweepr-angular/dist publish/mynsweepr-hooks/build publish/mynsweepr-tres/build publish/mynsweepr-vue && npm install && npm install -g @angular/cli@latest && cp *.*js publish/ && cp *.map publish/ && cp *.html publish/ && cp *.css publish/ && cp -r hm-datetimepicker publish/hm-datetimepicker && cp -r hm-grid publish/hm-grid && cd hm-walls && npm install && npm run build -- -c production --output-path ../publish/hm-walls/dist && cd ../hm-walls-api && npm install && npm run build && cd ../material-test && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist ../publish/material-test && cp index.html ../publish/material-test/ && cd ../mynsweepr-angular && npm install && npm run build -- -c production --output-path ../publish/mynsweepr-angular/dist && cd ../mynsweepr-hooks && npm install && npm run build && cp -r build/ ../publish/mynsweepr-hooks && cd ../mynsweepr-tres && npm install && npm run build && cp -r build/ ../publish/mynsweepr-tres && cd ../mynsweepr-vue && npm install && npm run build
